remarks: Value of the section operation.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jan-2017.)
statement:
issect.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
issect.h $e |- H = ( Hom ` C ) $.
issect.o $e |- .x. = ( comp ` C ) $.
issect.i $e |- .1. = ( Id ` C ) $.
issect.s $e |- S = ( Sect ` C ) $.
issect.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) $.
issect.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
issect.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
sectffval $p |- ( ph -> S = ( x e. B , y e. B |-> { <. f , g >. | ( ( f e. ( x H y ) /\ g e. ( y H x ) ) /\ ( g ( <. x , y >. .x. x ) f ) = ( .1. ` x ) ) } ) ) $.
$d .1. f g x y $.
$d .x. f g x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d C f g x y $.
$d H f g x y $.
$d X f g x y $.
$d Y f g x y $.
$d f g ph x y $.
